descriptions.username_requirements: Username can only contain letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens.
descriptions.password_requirements: Password must be at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, and numbers.

descriptions.role_default_description: Whether this role is assigned to new users by default.

descriptions.role_is_active: Whether this role is active and can be assigned to users
descriptions.role_is_default: Whether this role is assigned to new users by default
descriptions.slug_requirements: Slug can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens
